caseTitle: Pakistan Sports Board  thr. its D.G., Islamabad & another v. Pakistan Volley Ball Federation & others
tagline: The Pakistan Sports Board (PSB) cannot regulate or control any sports association which does not seek affiliation with it. However, if the respondent sports bodies want to be affiliated with the PSB and reap benefits which accrue with such affiliation, they cannot claim any exemptions from following the directives issued by the PSB.
